## Internationalization

Internationalization (i18n)

<center>

<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eamena-project/eamena-arches-dev/master/www/arches-v7-arches-v7-i18n.png" height="450">

</center>
<div class="captiontext">my caption</div>

<div class="fhstext">/opt/arches/eamena/eamena/settings.py</div>

```{.python code-line-numbers="5-9"}
LANGUAGE_CODE = "en"

# list of languages to display in the language switcher,
# if left empty or with a single entry then the switch won't be displayed
# language codes need to be all lower case with the form:
# {langcode}-{regioncode} eg: en, en-gb ....
# a list of language codes can be found here http://www.i18nguy.com/unicode/language-identifiers.html
LANGUAGES = [
#   ('de', _('German')),
    ('en', _('English')),
    ('ar', _('Arabic')),
#   ('en-gb', _('British English')),
#   ('es', _('Spanish')),
]
```
